settings.text: Dreams are often born where they serve as the only escape from harsh reality. Making these dreams come true is something that many unfortunately often fail to do.

Burak, a social worker from Hanau, has been working in Berlin's problem districts for years to ensure that such dreams don't just remain dreams. He helps young people from difficult backgrounds to master their everyday lives and realize their potential. As part of his work, he also got to know ZuZu, who grew up in Neukölln. ZuZu found refuge in dancing at an early age, recognized her talent and gained self-confidence from it.

The two quickly found a connection through their shared interest in hip-hop. When Burak found out that ZuZu had been unable to pursue her passion for some time, he was able to successfully find her a facility where she has been able to dance regularly ever since. She expresses her gratitude by serving as a role model for others and showing that there are many different ways to express your problems and emotions.

This release is a "Thank You" to our day ones and those carrying the legacy forward. Celebrating a heritage colorway, this silhouette honors MJ’s legacy, while upgrading the materials for those pushing culture to new heights. Featuring a premium leather upper and an icy sole for a timeless look.
